com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet.service

Interface IValueService


  • public interface IValueService
    Represents a cell value service

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear(IRangeAddress range)
      Clears the value in the range
      IValue get(int colNum, int rowNum)
      Get value of a cell with given row and column numbers
      IValue get(IRangeAddress range)
      Get value of a cell (of given single cell address) or top left cell (of given cells range)
      IValue get(String range)
      Get value of a cell (of given single cell address like "D9") or top left cell (of given cells range like "A1:B4")
      void parseContent(int colNum, int rowNum, String content)
      Sets a value in the single cell.
      void parseContent(IRangeAddress range, String content)
      Sets a value in the range of cells.

      Sets a value in the range of cells.

      Sets a value in the single cell.

      Set value to single cell with given column and row numbers

      Sets a value in the range of cells.

      Sets the value in the range of cells

      Sets a value in the range of cells.
      void set(String range, IValue value)
      Set value to range of cells with the given String with values like "A4" or "D4:G10"

        rowNum - the row number

        IValue of needed cell

        Get value of a cell (of given single cell address like "D9") or top left cell (of given cells range like "A1:B4")
        Parameters:
        range - the given range
        Returns:
        IValue of needed cell

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         IValue value)
        Sets the value in the range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the settings will be applied
        value - the value to be set
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IValue

      • set

        void set(String range,
         IValue value)
        Set value to range of cells with the given String with values like "A4" or "D4:G10"

        In case of incorrect string value throws an ParseRangeAddressException

        Parameters:
        range - the cells range
        value - the value
        See Also:
        IValue

      • set

        void set(int colNum,
         int rowNum,
         IValue value)
        Set value to single cell with given column and row numbers

        In case incorrect of any number throws an IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
        colNum - the column number
        rowNum - the row number
        See Also:
        IValue

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         Function<IValueFactory,IValue> valueFunction)
        Sets a value in the range of cells. For convenience, the user consumes a new instance of the IValueFactory and should return the built IValue. The builder is instantiated from the IScellApiResolver so that the user could register his own implementation using custom default data
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the value will be applied
        valueFunction - the Function with a new instance of IValueFactory

      • set

        void set(String range,
         Function<IValueFactory,IValue> valueFunction)
        Sets a value in the range of cells. For convenience, the user consumes a new instance of the IValueFactory and should return the built IValue. The builder is instantiated from the IScellApiResolver so that the user could register his own implementation using custom default data

        In case of incorrect string value throws an ParseRangeAddressException

        Parameters:
        range - the range like "A2" or "B2:D4" in which the value will be applied
        valueFunction - the Function with a new instance of IValueFactory

      • set

        void set(int colNum,
         int rowNum,
         Function<IValueFactory,IValue> valueFunction)
        Sets a value in the single cell. For convenience, the user consumes a new instance of the IValueFactory and should return the built IValue. The builder is instantiated from the IScellApiResolver so that the user could register his own implementation using custom default data

        In case incorrect of any number throws an IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
        colNum - the column number
        rowNum - the row number
        valueFunction - the Function with a new instance of IValueFactory

      • parseContent

        void parseContent(IRangeAddress range,
                  String content)
        Sets a value in the range of cells. The type of the value will be recognized.
        Parameters:
        range - the given range
        content - the content to be recognized

      • parseContent

        void parseContent(String range,
                  String content)
        Sets a value in the range of cells. The type of the value will be recognized.

        In case of incorrect string value throws an ParseRangeAddressException

        Parameters:
        range - the given range
        content - the content to be recognized

      • parseContent

        void parseContent(int colNum,
                  int rowNum,
                  String content)
        Sets a value in the single cell. The type of the value will be recognized.

        In case incorrect of any number throws an IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
        colNum - the column number
        rowNum - the row number
        content - the content to be recognized

      • updateExisting

        void updateExisting(IRangeAddress range,
                    UnaryOperator<IValue> editor)
        Edits the value in the range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the values will be eddited
        editor - the function that takes current value of the cell and produces a new value of the cell
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IValue

      • updateExisting

        void updateExisting(String range,
                    UnaryOperator<IValue> editor)
        Edit value of range of cells with the given String with values like "A4" or "D4:G10"

        In case of incorrect string value throws an ParseRangeAddressException

        Parameters:
        range - range of cells to edit its values
        editor - function to take current cell value and produce the new cell value
        See Also:
        IValue

      • updateExisting

        void updateExisting(int colNum,
                    int rowNum,
                    UnaryOperator<IValue> editor)
        Edit value of single cell with given column and row numbers

        In case incorrect of any number throws an IndexOutOfBoundsException

        Parameters:
        colNum - the column number
        rowNum - the row number
        editor - function to take current cell value and produce the new cell value
        See Also:
        IValue

      • clear

        void clear(IRangeAddress range)
        Clears the value in the range
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the clearing will be applied
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress
